title: # 489 - Shane Torres & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Shane Torres. We talk about Norm Macdonald, touring together, favorite moments in history, being a bad sales man, phrases we’ve always said wrong, and much more! 

Follow Shane here

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/shanetorres 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/shanetorres 

 

This episode is also brought to you by CrowdHealth. Try for 30 days risk free and get the fitness wearable at http://www.joincrowdhealth.com/fit and use the code “BERT” at sign up. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mack Weldon. Go to http://www.mackweldon.com/bert and use the code “Bert” at checkout for 20% off your first order.

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
